Class WorkflowBuilder<T extends Workflow,B extends WorkflowBuilder<T,B>>

java.lang.Object
gw.api.databuilder.DataBuilder<T,B>
gw.api.databuilder.WorkflowBuilder<T,B>
All Implemented Interfaces:
DelegateDataBuilder<T>, ValueGenerator<T>
Direct Known Subclasses:
ClaimWorkflowBuilder
